title: Matchsafe, "Asian Motifs", ca. 1885
markings: George W. Shiebler maker's mark (S in a circle flanked by wings), STERLING, 20 A all stamped on bezel.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Oblong, with rounded corners and hammered surface. Front features applied sprig of  foliage on body, above which are initials (F. L.?) incised in stylized, Asian inspired font, applied butterfly on lid. Reverse features applied palm fronds on body, applied crab on lid. Chain attached to lid. Lid hinged on side. Striker incised on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Asian Motifs", ca. 1885.
ca. 1885. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-205.
